Region IV
RICHARD B. HULL
WOI, Iowa State College
Ames, Iowa
Iowa, Minnesota, North and South
Dakota, Nebraska and Wyoming.
Dear Graydon:
It was good to talk to you on the telephone yesterday and to
learn of developments to date in connection with Earl Wynn.
I agree totally with the procedures you are suggesting and I
believe that haste is of the essence whatever the outcome.
If Earl definitely cannot do this it would certainly be a
dreadful mistake to not know this until the time of the
Minneapolis meeting. We would lose a whole month by this
procedure. If something does work out so that you are in
Chicago on Sunday next I will be delighted to meet with you.
They tell me I will not be involved in my session there until
3:00 in the afternoon. I will staying at the Conrad Hilton.
Best regards.
Sincerely,
Region V
RALPH W. STEETLE
WLSU, Louisiana State
University
Baton Rouge, La.
